data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Oud-Heverlee get the game underway.
Niklas Dorsch (Gent) has received a yellow card from Jonathan Lardot.
In the minute 41, Goal! Kamal Sowah gives Oud-Heverlee a 0-1 lead in Ghent.
It's now 0-2 in Ghent as Mathieu Maertens scores for Oud-Heverlee.
The first-half is over at Ghelamco Arena.
In the minute 46, Gent have kicked-off the second half at Ghelamco Arena.
Oud-Heverlee take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Kamal Sowah.
The home team have replaced Roman Bezus with Laurent Depoitre. This is the first substitution made today by Wim De Decker.
In the minute 54, Pierre-Yves Ngawa is replacing Dylan Ouedraogo for the away team.
Dylan Mbayo is on a sub for Anderson Niangbo for Gent.
Laurent Depoitre is booked for the home team.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Kristiyan Malinov with Aboubakar Keita.
Gent have been given a penalty...
Niklas Dorsch's penalty pulls one back for Gent at Ghelamco Arena.
Gent have been given a penalty at Ghelamco Arena...
In the minute 74, Goal! Gent now trail just 2-3 thanks to a penalty from Tim Kleindienst.
Oud-Heverlee make their third substitution with Olivier Myny replacing Kamal Sowah.
In the minute 84, Mathieu Maertens (Oud-Heverlee) gets a yellow card.
Wim De Decker (Gent) is making a third substitution, with Jordan Botaka replacing Alessio Castro-Montes.
At Ghelamco Arena, David Hubert has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
Rafael Romo (Oud-Heverlee) has received a first yellow card.
